Riven Mains:

They get a kill suddenly they turn godmode and talk shit/bm at every given opportunity. 

They get killed and you're playing an ez noskill champ that isn't worth their time so they afk. 

Then there's you. 

Though at least you don't get threatened to be killed, afk threats, reports, hack threats, shittalked, etc. just for clicking on your main...don't even gotta lock in {{champion:35}} *sigh*

I've played long enough to know assholes can use any champ, just as decent people can use any champ.  I've seen honorable players use {{champion:64}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:92}} and {{champion:67}}, just as I've seen toxic players use {{champion:201}} {{champion:37}} and {{champion:44}}.

The worst thing is when a truly toxic player who is shit talking, hitting on people playing female champs (don't even know if they are female IRL), feeding on purpose, saying they are "diamond" with a score of 0/10/3 against bots and flat out said that they are trolling just so him and his friends can have a laugh at the rest of us... Happens to be playing as your main
. -__-
